option.value: Updated mouse click handling to restrict shape selection to left-clicks and refreshed project documentation. Modified ViewController.java to ensure shape selection (line, rectangle, ellipse) only occurs on primary mouse button clicks, improving user interaction reliability. Updated SweepGitChanges.xml to include new commit summaries reflecting recent changes. Replaced Burndown chart.xlsx and Review Report Sprint 1.docx with updated versions to reflect current project progress and sprint review documentation.

Improved mouse click handling and updated project documentation. In ViewController.java, added checks to ensure shape selection and creation only occur on primary (left) mouse button clicks, enhancing user interaction reliability. Updated SweepGitChanges.xml to include new commit summaries reflecting recent changes. Modified Burndown chart.xlsx to reflect current task progress and added a new document Review Report Sprint 1.docx to document the sprint review outcomes.

Restricted file loading to only accept .txt files and improved error handling in ViewController.java. Updated the file chooser filters to correctly use "*.txt" instead of ".txt", added a check to ensure only .txt files can be loaded, and refactored repeated alert code into a reusable showAlert method for better maintainability. SweepGitChanges.xml was updated to include a new commit summary reflecting these enhancements.

Restricted file loading to only accept .txt files and improved error handling in ViewController.java. Updated the file chooser filters to correctly use "*.txt" instead of ".txt", added a check to ensure only .txt files can be loaded, and refactored repeated alert code into a reusable showAlert method for better maintainability. SweepGitChanges.xml was updated to include a new commit summary reflecting these changes.

Updated the Burndown chart to reflect the current task progress. The file "Burndown chart.xlsx" was modified to incorporate the latest project status, likely including updated task completion data and visualizations. Additionally, "SweepGitChanges.xml" was updated to include a new commit summary entry documenting recent enhancements related to JavaDoc comments and user alerts, ensuring accurate version tracking and historical context.

Added JavaDoc comments and user alerts to improve code clarity and user feedback. In ViewController.java, added detailed JavaDoc for key methods (e.g., shape highlighting, file operations) and implemented error alerts for failed save/load operations. In FileManager.java, documented the expected file format and added JavaDoc for saveFile and loadFile methods to clarify their behavior. SweepGitChanges.xml was updated to include a new commit summary reflecting these enhancements.

Implemented functionality to disable the "Save" menu item when the workspace is empty. Modified ViewController.java to add a new handler method (onClickFile) that checks if the workspace has any children and disables the saveButton accordingly. Also added a reference to the saveButton MenuItem via @FXML. Updated view.fxml to bind the "File" menu's onShowing event to the new handler and assigned an fx:id to the "Salva" MenuItem to enable programmatic access.

Fixed bugs related to saving and loading shapes. In `ViewController.java`, added null checks for `chosenShape` to prevent runtime errors when setting stroke and fill colors, and corrected file validation logic to check for null instead of relying on file extension. Removed unnecessary error messages. In `view.fxml`, connected the "Salva" and "Carica" menu items to their respective controller methods via `onAction` attributes. In `FileManager.java`, corrected shape type string from "Ellipse" to "EllipseShape" to ensure proper deserialization during file loading.

Updated SweepGitChanges.xml to include a new commit summary documenting recent changes to FileManager.java, Shape2DCreator.java, and Shape2DCreatorTest.java. These changes involved replacing deprecated setCenterX/Y methods with setShapeX/Y in FileManager.java for compatibility with the updated ShapeInterface, improving null and type safety in Shape2DCreator.java by replacing a switch statement with if-else logic, and adjusting Shape2DCreatorTest.java to reflect new default shape dimensions. SweepGitChanges.xml was modified to maintain an accurate history of these updates.

Updated FileManager.java to replace deprecated setCenterX/Y calls with setShapeX/Y for compatibility with the updated ShapeInterface. Modified Shape2DCreator.java to handle null or unexpected shape types more safely by replacing the switch statement with if-else logic. Adjusted Shape2DCreatorTest.java to reflect new default shape dimensions (width: 80, height: 50). Also updated SweepGitChanges.xml to include new commit summaries documenting these changes.
